name: Instant Pickled Carrot With Ginger
description: Pickle culture in India is as vast and diverse as its people, which is why Usha Prabakaran collected 1,000 recipes for her cult classic cookbook, “Usha’s Pickle Digest.” Her recipe for an instant carrot pickle, made with ginger and chile, is a simple one to master. It comes together quickly, and lasts for a couple of weeks in the refrigerator. Have it with rice and yogurt, or even in a sandwich with melted cheese.
keywords: carrot, ginger, lime, serrano, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 (2-inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped (about 2 tablespoons)
1 small green chile, such as serrano, seeded then finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; toss thoroughly.
Transfer mixture to a clean jar; it is ready to eat right away. Pickles keep at room temperature for 1 week, or refrigerated for 2 weeks.
